column2: the  officiate  registrar  were  concluded  on  the  same  day.  Considering  all
conclude that the  Learned High Court Judge had failed to  afford a fair trial to  the  accused in this case.
The Learned Deputy Solicitor General who represented the  Attorney General did not contest this matter

column1: and I appreciate the position taken up by state in this case.

column2: For the  reasons  adduced above  I set aside the conviction and  sentences imposed by Learned High  Court

column1: Judge on all 4 accused-appellants and order a fresh trial before a different High Court Judge.
